languages.text: {n}Лицо Соломона становится безжизненным, костяшки белеют.{/n} "Я считал, что моя беззаветная верность Лексу очевидна. Но меня проверяли и прослушивали, как какого-то постороннего. Как не-арбитра. Еще и Глейто в это втянули — лучше бы установили в меня свою шпионскую дрянь".

{n}Solomorne's face turns lifeless, his knuckles white.{/n} "I thought my wholehearted loyalty to the Lex was obvious. But you were monitoring me, keeping tabs on me like some kind of outsider. Like a non-Arbitrator. You even dragged Glaito into it too — it would have been better if you'd installed your damned recording devices in me."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Соломона становится безжизненным, костяшки белеют.{/n} "Я считал, что моя беззаветная верность Лексу очевидна. Но меня проверяли и прослушивали, как какого-то постороннего. Как не-арбитра. Еще и Глейто в это втянули — лучше бы установили в меня свою шпионскую дрянь".

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne's face turns lifeless, his knuckles white.{/n} "I thought my wholehearted loyalty to the Lex was obvious. But you were testing me, keeping tabs on me like some kind of outsider. Like a non-Arbitrator. You even dragged Glaito into it too — it would have been better if you'd installed your spy crap in me."

Like a non-Arbitrator. You even dragged Glaito into it too — it would have been better if you'd installed your spy crap in me."

Like a non-Arbitrator. You even dragged Glaito into it too — it would have been better if you'd installed your spy crap in me."

Like a non-Arbitrator. You even dragged Glaito into it too — it would have been better if you'd installed your damned recording devices in me."

Like a non-Arbitrator. You even dragged Glaito into it too — it would have been better if you'd installed your damned recording devices in me."

{n}Solomorne's face turns lifeless, his knuckles white.{/n} "I thought my wholehearted loyalty to the Lex was obvious. But you were monitoring me, keeping tabs on me like some kind of outsider. Like a non-Arbitrator. You even dragged Glaito into it too — it would have been better if you'd installed your damned recording devices in me."

languages.text: {n}Aus Solomornes Gesicht weicht alles Leben. Seine Knöchel sind kalkweiß.{/n} "Ich dachte, meine unerschütterliche Loyalität gegenüber dem Lex wäre offensichtlich. Aber Ihr habt mich überwacht, als wäre ich irgendein Fremder. Kein Arbitrator. Sogar Glaito habt Ihr missbraucht ... es wäre besser gewesen, Ihr hättet Euer verdammtes Aufzeichnungsgerät in mir installiert."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's face turns lifeless, his knuckles white.{/n} "I thought my wholehearted loyalty to the Lex was obvious. But you were monitoring me, keeping tabs on me like some kind of outsider. Like a non-Arbitrator. You even dragged Glaito into it too — it would have been better if you'd installed your damned recording devices in me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aus Solomornes Gesicht weicht alles Leben. Seine Knöchel sind kalkweiß.{/n} "Ich dachte, meine unerschütterliche Loyalität gegenüber dem Lex wäre offensichtlich. Aber Ihr habt mich überwacht, als wäre ich irgendein Fremder. Kein Arbitrator. Sogar Glaito habt Ihr missbraucht ... es wäre besser gewesen, Ihr hättet Euer verdammtes Aufzeichnungsgerät in mir installiert."

{n}Aus Solomornes Gesicht weicht alles Leben. Seine Knöchel sind kalkweiß.{/n} "Ich dachte, meine unerschütterliche Loyalität gegenüber dem Lex wäre offensichtlich. Aber Ihr habt mich überwacht, als wäre ich irgendein Fremder. Kein Arbitrator. Sogar Glaito habt Ihr missbraucht ... es wäre besser gewesen, Ihr hättet Eure Spionagescheiße in mir installiert."

languages.text: {n}Le visage de Solomorne se vide de toute expression et ses phalanges blanchissent.{/n} « Je pensais que ma loyauté indéfectible à la Lex était évidente. Mais vous m'avez surveillé, me gardant à l'œil comme si j'étais un étranger. Comme un non-arbitrator. Vous avez même impliqué Glaito — il aurait mieux valu que vous installiez votre saleté de matériel d'enregistrement en moi. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's face turns lifeless, his knuckles white.{/n} "I thought my wholehearted loyalty to the Lex was obvious. But you were monitoring me, keeping tabs on me like some kind of outsider. Like a non-Arbitrator. You even dragged Glaito into it too — it would have been better if you'd installed your damned recording devices in me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage de Solomorne se vide de toute expression et ses phalanges blanchissent.{/n} « Je pensais que ma loyauté indéfectible à la Lex était évidente. Mais vous m'avez surveillé, me gardant à l'œil comme si j'étais un étranger. Comme un non-arbitrator. Vous avez même impliqué Glaito — il aurait mieux valu que vous installiez votre saleté de matériel d'enregistrement en moi. »

{n}Le visage de Solomorne se vide de toute expression et ses phalanges blanchissent.{/n} « Je pensais que ma loyauté indéfectible à la Lex était évidente. Mais vous m'avez surveillé, me gardant à l'œil comme si j'étais un étranger. Comme un non-arbitrator. Vous avez même impliqué Glaito — il aurait mieux valu que vous installiez votre saleté de matériel de surveillance en moi. »

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙脸上立刻失去了所有表情，指关节都捏得发白了。{/n}“我还以为我对帝国法典的忠诚人尽皆知，可你却一直在监视我，像盯着外人一样盯着我，就好像我根本不是法务官的成员一样。你甚至把格雷托都牵扯进来了。不如你把那操蛋的窃听器也装在我身上吧，那就更完美了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's face turns lifeless, his knuckles white.{/n} "I thought my wholehearted loyalty to the Lex was obvious. But you were monitoring me, keeping tabs on me like some kind of outsider. Like a non-Arbitrator. You even dragged Glaito into it too — it would have been better if you'd installed your damned recording devices in me."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙脸上立刻失去了所有表情，指关节都捏得发白了。{/n}“我还以为我对帝国法典的忠诚人尽皆知，可你却一直在监视我，像盯着外人一样盯着我，就好像我根本不是法务官的成员一样。你甚至把格雷托都牵扯进来了。不如你把那操蛋的窃听器也装在我身上吧，那就更完美了。”
{n}索罗蒙脸上立刻失去了所有表情，指关节都捏得发白了。{/n}“我还以为我对帝国法典的忠诚人尽皆知，可你却一直在监视我，像盯着外人一样盯着我，就好像我根本不是法务官的成员一样。你甚至把格雷托都牵扯进来了。要是你把那套搞窃听的操蛋玩意儿也装在我身上，那可真是太棒了。”

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Solomorne se vuelve pétreo y sus nudillos, blancos.{/n} «Creía que mi lealtad completa a la Lex era evidente, pero me estaban vigilando, como si fuera un simple desconocido. Como si no fuera un Arbitrator. Incluso han involucrado a Glaito en esto... Habría preferido que instalaran esos malditos dispositivos de grabación en mi cuerpo».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's face turns lifeless, his knuckles white.{/n} "I thought my wholehearted loyalty to the Lex was obvious. But you were monitoring me, keeping tabs on me like some kind of outsider. Like a non-Arbitrator. You even dragged Glaito into it too — it would have been better if you'd installed your damned recording devices in me."

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Solomorne se vuelve pétreo y sus nudillos, blancos.{/n} «Creía que mi lealtad completa a la Lex era evidente, pero me estaban vigilando, como si fuera un simple desconocido. Como si no fuera un Arbitrator. Incluso han involucrado a Glaito en esto... Habría preferido que instalaran esos malditos dispositivos de grabación en mi cuerpo».

{n}El rostro de Solomorne se vuelve pétreo y sus nudillos, blancos.{/n} «Creía que mi lealtad completa a la Lex era evidente, pero me estaban vigilando, como si fuera un simple desconocido. Como si no fuera un Arbitrator. Incluso han involucrado a Glaito en esto... Habría preferido que instalaran su mierda espía en mi cuerpo».

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは無表情になり、指の関節が白くなった。{/n}「私のレックスへの全身全霊の忠誠心は明らかだと思っていました。ですが、あなたは私を監視し、まるで部外者のように、アービトレイターでない者のように私を見張っていたのですね。グライトまで巻き込むとは…せめて私にクソ盗聴器を仕込んでおけばよかったのに」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's face turns lifeless, his knuckles white.{/n} "I thought my wholehearted loyalty to the Lex was obvious. But you were monitoring me, keeping tabs on me like some kind of outsider. Like a non-Arbitrator. You even dragged Glaito into it too — it would have been better if you'd installed your damned recording devices in me."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは無表情になり、指の関節が白くなった。{/n}「私のレックスへの全身全霊の忠誠心は明らかだと思っていました。ですが、あなたは私を監視し、まるで部外者のように、アービトレイターでない者のように私を見張っていたのですね。グライトまで巻き込むとは…せめて私の中にスパイを仕込んでおけばよかったものを」
{n}ソロモーンは無表情になり、指の関節が白くなった。{/n}「私のレックスへの全身全霊の忠誠心は明らかだと思っていました。ですが、あなたは私を監視し、まるで部外者のように、アービトレイターでない者のように私を見張っていたのですね。グライトまで巻き込むとは…せめて私の中にスパイを仕込んでおけばよかったものを」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un beti benzi atıyor, elleri buz kesiyor.{/n} "Lex'e olan içten sadakatim su götürmez sanıyordum. Meğerse izleniyormuşum. Bir yabancı gibi, Yargıcı değilmişim gibi gözetlemişsiniz beni. Yetmemiş, Glaito'yu da alet etmişsiniz... Oldu olacak şu kahrolası dinleme cihazlarını bana taksaymışsınız."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's face turns lifeless, his knuckles white.{/n} "I thought my wholehearted loyalty to the Lex was obvious. But you were monitoring me, keeping tabs on me like some kind of outsider. Like a non-Arbitrator. You even dragged Glaito into it too — it would have been better if you'd installed your damned recording devices in me."

Bir yabancı gibi, Yargıcı değilmişim gibi gözetlemişsiniz beni. Yetmemiş, Glaito'yu da alet etmişsiniz... Oldu olacak şu kahrolası dinleme cihazlarını bana taksaymışsınız."

{n}Solomorne'un beti benzi atıyor, elleri buz kesiyor.{/n} "Lex'e olan içten sadakatim su götürmez, sanıyordum. Meğerse izleniyormuşum. Bir yabancı gibi, Yargıcı değilmişim gibi gözetlemişsiniz beni. Yetmemiş, Glaito'yu da alet etmişsiniz... Oldu olacak şu dinleme cihazını direkt bana taksaymışsınız."
